pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 18, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, May 18, 2017:

Seattle, Washington, United States

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Honorable Jay Inslee, Governor of Washington.

Renaissance Seattle Hotel
515 Madison Street
Seattle, Washington

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.


Burnaby, British Columbia

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit Electronic Arts Canada’s Capture Lab.

Electronic Arts Capture Lab
4336 Sanderson Way
Burnaby, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m. for registration

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with technology leaders in Vancouver and the Vancouver Economic Commission.

Electronic Arts Capture Lab
4336 Sanderson Way
Burnaby, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the roundtable
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m. for registration


Media appearance

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Télé-Québec’s MTL at 8:00 p.m.


Note: all times local
